ygData.subject: RE: Jewelry - what are you wearing?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i was happy to get rid of my GLS finally when i got a crown of the froglok kings.  along with having no graphic, the primary attribute of any headpiece i
ygData.messageBody:
> If I can find something else that emits
> light (does the
> Runed bone fork?), I'd happily give up my lightstone. Till
> then though,
> it's got a permanent place in my inventory.

i was happy to get rid of my GLS finally when i got a crown of the froglok
kings. along with having no graphic, the primary attribute of any headpiece
i wear, it emits a GLS effect.

>
> Heh is that the third last name you've gone through? :P

yes unfortunately. hopefully the last but with my wife playing you never
know.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
